tasks.title: Rewrite README.md with Comprehensive Documentation
tasks.description: Create a comprehensive README.md that properly documents the repository structure, setup instructions, and architecture overview based on the repository snapshot.
tasks.details:
Create a new README.md with the following sections:
1. Project Overview (name, purpose, tech stack)
2. Quick Start Guide (prerequisites, installation, development commands)
3. Architecture Overview (brief explanation of Nuxt 4 + Content v3)
4. Repository Structure (key directories and their purposes)
5. Content Management (how to add/edit blog posts and pages)
6. Deployment Process

Use the structure from the repository snapshot as a guide. Include code blocks for installation and development commands using pnpm. Add a screenshot of the site if available. Ensure all links are absolute and working.
tasks.testStrategy: Manual review of the README.md for completeness, accuracy, and clarity. Verify all commands work as documented by following the setup instructions on a fresh clone of the repository.

tasks.title: Consolidate Architecture Documentation
tasks.description: Organize and consolidate architecture documentation by creating a permanent architecture overview and preserving migration history.
tasks.details:
1. Create a new directory structure in `/docs/` with the following:
   - `/docs/architecture/overview.md` - Current architecture state
   - `/docs/architecture/history/` - Move migration plans here

2. In the overview.md, document:
   - Content v3 schema design and data flow
   - Component structure and responsibilities
   - Routing strategy (especially dynamic routes)
   - Build and deployment process
   - TypeScript integration

3. Include diagrams if possible (can use Mermaid syntax for GitHub rendering)

4. Update any references to old documentation locations
tasks.testStrategy: Review documentation for technical accuracy. Have another team member attempt to understand the architecture solely from the documentation. Verify all links between documents work correctly.

tasks.title: Audit and Clean Configuration Files
tasks.description: Review and clean up Nuxt and Tailwind configuration files to remove legacy settings and ensure they're optimized for Nuxt 4 and Content v3.
tasks.details:
1. In `nuxt.config.ts`:
   - Verify `compatibilityVersion: 4` is set
   - Remove any deprecated options from Nuxt 2/3
   - Ensure Content v3 module is properly configured
   - Check for optimal build settings for static site generation
   - Verify TypeScript integration settings

2. In `tailwind.config.js`:
   - Update to use the latest Tailwind v6.14.0 features
   - Ensure content paths include all Vue files (`app/**/*.{vue,js,ts}`)
   - Verify theme customizations are working
   - Remove any legacy plugins or configurations

3. In `content.config.ts`:
   - Verify schema definitions match actual content structure
   - Ensure proper typing for all collections
   - Check for any performance optimizations
tasks.testStrategy: Run build process with verbose logging to check for warnings. Test development server startup time. Verify hot module replacement works correctly. Check build output size and optimize if necessary.

tasks.title: Verify and Fix Asset Migration
tasks.description: Ensure all assets used in Markdown content are correctly located in the public directory and referenced via absolute paths.
tasks.testStrategy: Run the verification script and ensure zero errors. Manually check a sample of blog posts in the development environment to verify images load correctly. Test the production build to ensure all assets are correctly included and referenced.

tasks.title: Implement Search Functionality
tasks.description: Implement Nuxt Content v3 search functionality to allow users to search through blog posts and content pages.
tasks.testStrategy: Test search functionality with various queries to ensure it returns relevant results. Verify performance by testing with large content sets. Test edge cases like empty queries, special characters, and very long search terms. Ensure the UI correctly displays loading states during searches. Verify the search component works correctly both in the navigation and on the dedicated search page. Ensure the UI is responsive and accessible.

tasks.title: Enhance SEO Implementation
tasks.description: Verify and improve SEO implementation using Nuxt's useHead and meta tag generation for the new Content v3 schema.
tasks.testStrategy: Use tools like Lighthouse, SEO Checker, and social media debuggers (Facebook, Twitter) to verify meta tags are correctly implemented. Test structured data with Google's Rich Results Test. Verify sitemap.xml is valid and includes all pages.

tasks.title: Update Copilot Instructions for Nuxt 4 and Content v3
tasks.description: Update GitHub Copilot instructions to reference Nuxt 4 and Content v3 patterns, removing any legacy v2 references.
tasks.details:
1. Locate all Copilot instruction files in the repository:
   - `.github/copilot-instructions.md`
   - Any other instruction files in `.github/` or `.gemini/`

2. Update the instructions to reflect Nuxt 4 and Content v3 patterns:
   - Replace references to Nuxt 2 with Nuxt 4 equivalents
   - Update Content module references to use Content v3 API
   - Update component examples to use Composition API
   - Update file path references to match the new directory structure
   - Include examples of proper TypeScript usage

3. Add specific instructions for:
   - Content schema definition in `content.config.ts`
   - Proper use of `queryContent()` and `<ContentRenderer />`
   - Tailwind CSS v6.14.0 usage patterns
   - Pug template usage with Vue 3

4. Merge any separate migration instructions into the main instructions file

5. Add examples of best practices for:
   - TypeScript type definitions
   - Vue 3 Composition API usage
   - Content v3 query patterns
   - Dynamic routing with Nuxt 4
tasks.testStrategy: Have GitHub Copilot generate code based on the updated instructions and verify it follows Nuxt 4 and Content v3 patterns. Test the generated code in the project to ensure it works correctly.

tasks.title: Implement Basic Testing Framework
tasks.description: Set up a basic testing framework to address the lack of automated testing identified in the technical debt section.
tasks.testStrategy: Run the test suite to verify it works correctly. Add tests for at least one core component and one utility function. Verify GitHub Actions runs tests on push and pull requests.
